pages.text: $(li)The Jungle is a biome with a humid climate composed mostly of very tall Jungle Trees, Leaves and Vines that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Here you can find vegetation such as Bananas Bundles, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/melon_slice)Melons$(/l), Oak trees, Jungle trees, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cocoa_beans)Cocoa$(/l), Poppies, Dandelions, Bird of Paradise and Vines.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/leafcutter)Leftcutter Ants$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/plantain_spider)Plantain Spiders$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/chimpanzee)Chimpanzees$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/gorilla)Gorillas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/capuchin_monkey)Capuchin Monkeys$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/cat)Cats$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/ocelot)Ocelots$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Jungle$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
